insert.trim: INTO BOARD (b_code, b_id, b_name, b_email, b_dname, b_title, b_content, b_views, b_created, bt_code) VALUES (board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{board.b_id}, #{board.b_name}, #{board.b_email}, #{board.b_dname}, #{board.b_title}, #{board.b_content}, 0, sysdate, #{board.bt_code}) INTO NOTICEBOARD (nb_code, b_code) VALUES (notice_seq.NEXTVAL, board_seq.CURRVAL)
